concept.title: Modifying the Default Disk Store
concept.shortdesc: You can modify the behavior of the default disk store by specifying the attributes you want for the disk store named "DEFAULT".

section.p: Whenever you use disk stores without specifying the disk store to use, uses the disk store named "DEFAULT".

For example, these region and queue configurations specify persistence and/or overflow, but do not specify the disk-store-name. Because no disk store is specified, these use the disk store named "DEFAULT".
